title: Tattered Bee Wing
summaries: The Tattered Bee Wing is a rare Hardmode crafting material dropped by Moss Hornets with a 1*1/100 (1%) / 0.67*1/150 (0.67%) chance. It is used solely to craft Bee Wings.
On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, at least one Mechanical Boss must be defeated before it will drop.

statistics.Sell: 250

ingredients.value:
• [img:Soul of Flight]Soul of Flight (20)
  • [img:Tattered Bee Wing]Tattered Bee Wing
